views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

customReturnKey gives you the Way to Custom Change the Text for the Return and Search Keys on Keyboards.

The Custom Return/Search Keys Text are working on System Wide (All iOS Keyboards).

Furthermore, customReturnKey has also the options to Hide the Names of the return and Search Keys in Keyboards and to Disable the tapping on Both Keys in Keyboards.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

More Stuff to come!

iOS 11 is on Full Compatibility Stage in the Next Works.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
